+ Princess Meri

Meri is a pullable caster character released in version 2.0 of Foundation Crumbling.

++ Lore

[[=]]
//"Not fully human, nor fully animal, but you, Meri. A person."//
//- In-game description//
[[/=]]

Meri entered containment as a baby, and was raised under the care of Director Sophia Light. During her childhood, she was able to temporarily return to her homeland, the Garden of Paradise, in the dreamscape, and met a mysterious figure that began training her on her innate abilities. Due to her natural curiosity, Meri became adept at controlling nature, but found that sustained reality bending made her incredibly fatigued.

In present times, Meri works for the Foundation as a junior researcher in anomalous botany and literature. Using her innate abilities and resistance to the anomalous, Meri ventures into the world to investigate unexplored phenomena. However, a [# Shadow] follows Meri, and there may be more to her than initially meets the eye.

++ Gameplay

Meri is a casting class character focused around the utilization of nature in battle. Her playstyle involves carefully balancing stamina to deliver massively damaging attacks to enemies. For this reason, many players have referred to Meri as a "glass cannon" type character.

Meri's passive skill, //**Born from Nature**//, doubles the amount of nature-based progression resources gained from enemies and at the end of boss encounters if she is in your party.  Meri's active skill, //**Vines Outstretched**//, ensnares enemies, and increases the damage they take from incoming attacks by 1.5x. Her ultimate, //**The Cold Wind's Whisper**//, temporarily buffs all of Meri's attacks for its duration, though at the cost of a steadily depleting health bar. In this state, Meri transforms into her alternate form, commonly referred to as her "shadow," to deliver devastating close-range attacks on enemies.

+ Trivia

* Meri is transgender, with her character stories heavily focusing on themes of dysphoria, acceptance, and humanity.
* [# Hana Thompson], a character released in the 1.5 Foundation Crumbling update, are in a relationship, and receive an attack damage buff when in the same party as one another.
* Pre-rework, Meri saw one of the lowest uses in end-game content among playable characters, but saw a considerable uptick in players after the 2.0 update.
